docs.abstract: Hal Helman article on apparent link between chem emissions from chem and other mfg plants and NJ's high cancer mortality rate hails passage of Toxic Substances Control Act (M)
docs.lead_paragraph: ALL Americans suffer a lovehate relationship with technology. We snap up its offerings -air-conditioning, dishwash ers, flights to far-off nations and sneer at materialism.
